properties.entry: SELECT BOARD_NM FROM BOARD_TYPE WHERE BOARD_CD = ?
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_CD = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM( SELECT ROWNUM RNUM, A. * FROM( SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE,BOARD_CONTENT, MEMBER_NM, TO_CHAR(BOARD_DT, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS BOARD_DT, READ_COUNT FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING(MEMBER_NO) WHERE BOARD_CD = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'Y' ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC )A ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?

SELECT BOARD_NO, BOARD_TITLE, BOARD_CONTENT, BOARD_DT, MODIFY_DT, READ_COUNT, MEMBER_NM, MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_PROFILE, BOARD_NM FROM BOARD JOIN MEMBER USING (MEMBER_NO) JOIN BOARD_TYPE USING(BOARD_CD) WHERE BOARD_NO = ? AND BOARD_ST = 'Y'
